comment: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase complexes:3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase a part of multi-step reaction (see R01702+R04097+R07618, possibly identical to R01651) subsequently R04097 TPP-dependent enzyme (see R07601+R07602)
name: 4-methyl-2-oxopentanoate:[dihydrolipoyllysine-residue (2-methylpropanoyl)transferase] lipoyllysine 2-oxidoreductase (decarboxylating, acceptor-2-methylpropanoylating)
